amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for fossil energy research and development by $32 million and increase the funding for the Solar Energy program by $16 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the appropriations for fossil energy research and development by $16,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 264 (Roll no. 584).
